message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $100. It's a great deal for you, as it's worth $120 to you! Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $80 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $90.  This is still a good price for you, considering the product's value to you. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $90, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
